title: `@metamask/json-rpc-engine` - Create tags for release commits that were untagged in the pre-migration repo
body:
## Explanation

While migrating `@metamask/json-rpc-engine` into the core repo, some earlier release commits that were untagged in the original repo were skipped by the tag porting script. These need to be tagged manually.

- Motivation: https://github.com/MetaMask/core/pull/1802#issuecomment-1791514273
- ~TODO: GitHub may show these manually-created tags out of order due to sorting by tag creation date instead of release commit timestamp.~
- ~Update `autochange-log` so that it's validator accepts tag diff links for manually-created tags that may not be under the `@metamask/` namespace.~

## References

- See https://github.com/MetaMask/core/issues/1551#issuecomment-1745665740 for an outline of the migration process.
- Partially implements https://github.com/MetaMask/core/issues/1981

- Successfully added missing `json-rpc-engine` tags to core.

- Tags are sorted by release commit timestamp if created with the `git tag <tag-name> [commit-hash]` command.

- Newly added `json-rpc-engine` tags:
```output
❯ git push upstream --tags
Total 0 (delta 0), reused 0 (delta 0), pack-reused 0
To https://github.com/MetaMask/core.git
 * [new tag]           json-rpc-engine@3.0.1 -> json-rpc-engine@3.0.1
 * [new tag]           json-rpc-engine@3.1.0 -> json-rpc-engine@3.1.0
 * [new tag]           json-rpc-engine@3.1.1 -> json-rpc-engine@3.1.1
 * [new tag]           json-rpc-engine@3.3.0 -> json-rpc-engine@3.3.0
 * [new tag]           json-rpc-engine@3.3.1 -> json-rpc-engine@3.3.1
 * [new tag]           json-rpc-engine@3.4.0 -> json-rpc-engine@3.4.0
 * [new tag]           json-rpc-engine@3.5.0 -> json-rpc-engine@3.5.0
 * [new tag]           json-rpc-engine@3.6.0 -> json-rpc-engine@3.6.0
 * [new tag]           json-rpc-engine@3.6.1 -> json-rpc-engine@3.6.1
 * [new tag]           json-rpc-engine@3.6.2 -> json-rpc-engine@3.6.2
 * [new tag]           json-rpc-engine@3.6.3 -> json-rpc-engine@3.6.3
 * [new tag]           json-rpc-engine@3.7.0 -> json-rpc-engine@3.7.0
 * [new tag]           json-rpc-engine@3.7.1 -> json-rpc-engine@3.7.1
 * [new tag]           json-rpc-engine@3.7.2 -> json-rpc-engine@3.7.2
 * [new tag]           json-rpc-engine@3.7.3 -> json-rpc-engine@3.7.3
 * [new tag]           json-rpc-engine@3.7.4 -> json-rpc-engine@3.7.4
 * [new tag]           json-rpc-engine@3.8.0 -> json-rpc-engine@3.8.0
 * [new tag]           json-rpc-engine@5.1.7 -> json-rpc-engine@5.1.7
```
